[[1974â75 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1974â75]] !! Next season \rightarrow
[[1976â77 Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu season|1976â77]] |} At the end of 1975â76 season [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] after two seasons since its relegated from the league in [[1973â74 Turkish First Football League|1973â74]] season. It was the second promotion of the team. The [[1974â75 Turkish Second Football League|1974â75]] season was the sixth season of [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]] (MÄ°Y) football team in [[Turkish Second Football League]], the second level division in [[Turkey]]. They finished 1st in the Red Group. The president of the club was [[Kaya Mutlu]], mayor of the [[Mersin]] city. General captain was Burhan Kanun. Club director was KazÄ±m TunÃ§. The manager of the team was [[Kadri AytaÃ§]], former player of [[Galatasaray S.K. (football team)|Galatasaray]] and [[Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu]].From the club history at [http://www.mersinidmanyurdu.org.tr/tr/icerik/7-tarihce.html Mersin Ä°dmanyurdu Official Web Site]. They have lost second league championship game against [[Samsunspor]]. ==Pre-season== The team attended Spor-Toto Cup organiized between 02.08.1975 and 30.08.1975 in 7th group together with Adanaspor, Hatayspor, Ä°skenderunspor and Konya Ä°dmanyurdu. * 30.08.1975 - MÄ°Y-Syria Amateur national football team. ==1975â76 league participation== In its 13th season ([[1975â76 Turkish Second Football League|1975â76]]) [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] was played with 32 teams, 16 in red group and 16 in white group. First teams promoted to [[Turkish First Football League|First League]] [[1976â77 Turkish First Football League|1976â77]] and last teams relegated to [[Turkish Third Football League|Third League]] [[1976â77 Turkish Third Footbal League|1976â77]] in each group. Mersin Ä°Y became 1st with 14 wins and 39 goals in Red Group. [[Åeref Has]] was the most scorer player with 9 goals. ===League table=== Mersin Ä°Y's league performance in [[Turkish Second Football League|Second League]] Red Group in [[1975â76 Turkish Second Football League|1975â76]] season is shown in the following table.See full table and results from [http://www.angelfire.com/nj/sivritepe/7576/CP2L.html Cem Pekin Archives]. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
